### Activities

::: {.callout-important}
## Tasks

- Create researcher profiles on Google Scholar, ResearchGate, ORCiD, and LinkedIn.
- Conduct topic analysis and concept mapping.
- Download and use the provided template to complete the tasks. Download the template here: [Task template](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1guUlKjKb73bmHQ0U9CsiKGhvWfqA9wer/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=100209563543563577528&rtpof=true&sd=true){:target="_blank"}

:::
